text: Richard Gordon Scott (November 7, 1928 - September 22, 2015) was an American nuclear engineer and a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). He was the sixth most senior apostle among the ranks of the church. ==Other websites== *"General Authorities: Elder Richard G. Scott", lds.org *Grampa Bill's G.A. Pages: Richard G. title: Richard G. Scott
